scripts.buildBabelConfiguration: npm run lint && babel --presets "@babel/env" source/babel.configuration.js --out-file distributable/babel.configuration.js --source-maps 1>/dev/null
scripts.buildConfiguration: npm run buildBabelConfiguration && babel --config-file ./distributable/babel.configuration source/configuration.js --out-file distributable/configuration.js --source-maps 1>/dev/null
scripts.buildJake: npm run buildConfiguration && babel --config-file ./distributable/babel.configuration source/Jakefile.js --out-file Jakefile.js --source-maps && babel --config-file ./distributable/babel.configuration source/task --copy-files --out-dir distributable/task --source-maps 1>/dev/null
scripts.runCompleted: npm run buildAll && node distributable/command/index.js --logLevel debug --logPath "/Users/fficnar/Library/Logs/azog/azog.log" --downloadedPath "resource/deluge/downloaded" --processingPath "resource/deluge/processing" --processedPath "resource/deluge/processed" --failedPath "resource/deluge/failed" completed 0001
